price: E não sejas, de modo algum, dos que desmentem os sinais de Allah, pois, serias dos perdedores.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnanna mina alladhīna kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi fatakūna mina al-khāsirīna
